summary: Experienced business development professional, scientist and leader with a broad analytical skill set curated over 20 years in areas such as:  ADME and pharmacokinetics, antibiotic development, CMC development of biopharmaceuticals of an array of modalities. Inspired by collaboration and innovation. Passionate about connecting innovators with high-quality custom analytical and formulation services to enable successful market applications of advanced biologics. Committed to creating impactful partnerships and driving excellence in the biopharmaceutical industry. Let's connect to explore opportunities for growth and excellence in biotherapeutic drug product development.

ingestedContentSummary.description: Applied Photophysics are specialists in Circular Dichroism and Stopped-Flow Spectrometry, providing solutions for the Biophysical Characterization of Biomolecules worldwide.
ingestedContentSummary.title: Biophysical Summit

message.text:
Please join KBI and Applied Photophysics for our Biophysical Summit in Louisville Colorado.  The summit is tomorrow and the attendance may be onsite or online.  Hope to see you there!

Join Us Tomorrow – May 9th Biophysical Summit                                
 Join the meeting now Meeting ID: 266 482 653 25 Passcode: sLfiop                              
 Dial-in by phone  +1 980-729-7669, Phone conference ID: 482 571 563#                          
 If you have any onsite questions, please see Amber Raines araines@kbibiopharma.com
In person:
start time 8 am MT
Site Location: 1450 Infinite Drive Louisville, CO 80027 - Training Room of the Amenity Wing

Meet our new team member.  So glad Sabrina has joined us!   If you are in Europe and would like to discuss analytical support needs for your organization, please reach out directly or I can connect you with Sabrina.

Our Business Development team for Analytical and Formulation Sciences (AFS) is growing, and we recently welcomed Dr. Sabrina Schubert on board! 

As our new Associate Director of Business Development, Sabrina is responsible for promoting our AFS capabilities, establishing new customer relationships, and providing excellent service to our customers across Europe. Since her first day, she’s been impressed by the company culture of collaboration and enthusiasm to support one another. "I’m happy being part of this highly motivated team and looking forward to contributing to its further success and the company's growth," she shared.  

Sabrina lives in Vienna and works as a remote member of our team. When she's not working, you can find her enjoying quality time with her family and two cats, repairing and storing mid-century furniture, or thrifting at flea markets.  

Please join us in extending a warm welcome to Sabrina and wishing her an exciting career ahead at KBI!  

#EmployeeSpotlight #TeamMemberTuesday #KBIBiopharma

This is cool technology.  With over 1000 e. coli genes removed, the protein production titers are up to 50g per liter in rapid time and relatively low cost… with very low endotoxin, no kanamycin needed, soluble aggregates, removing unit operations from production lines, stable cell line and many more customized benefits - perfect biological machine to make the next generation therapeutics.

ingestedContentSummary.description: Watch the Webinar: Microbial Expression Systems get a Much Needed Upgrade
ingestedContentSummary.title: KBI Biopharma | Webinar on Demand

message.text:
Seeking a Solution for Optimal Therapeutic Protein Production? Look No Further! KBI Biopharma has the answer with our groundbreaking PUREplatform™, designed to overcome the challenges of legacy microbial expression systems. 

Replay our webinar with Dr. Erik Nordwald, hosted by GEN, to gain valuable insights and learn about the pivotal role of PUREcoli™ in streamlining microbial biologic development.

https://hubs.la/Q02cxXLG0
This group is leading in pre-clinical development and translational capabilities.  Their organoid technology has exciting potential and is fun to read about.

ingestedContentSummary.description: Schedule a dedicated meeting with our team. Request your meeting today and we'll respond promptly. Your privacy is assured.
ingestedContentSummary.title: Meet our colleagues at Immuno 2024 - Schedule a Meeting

message.text:
Meet our colleagues at Immuno 2024, Booth 16 for a two-day event packed with research and cutting-edge insights on the latest advancements in the discovery & development of cancer immunotherapies.

We are known for our high-quality and expansive in vivo, in vitro, and ex vivo preclinical models, and partner with our clients to quantify the efficacy and pharmacological profile of their drug candidate(s) before they move into the clinic. 

We aim to deliver superior drug candidates to ensure that patients get the right treatment at the right time.

Schedule a meeting ➡️ https://bit.ly/43YsShU 

Eric Obeng, Ph.D.  Valerie Vince  Adrien Mossu  Sarah Wagner  Sander Basten, PhD   Oxford Global

#Bioscience #Biotech #Cancer #Immunotherapies

If you are at American Biomanufacturing Summit, stop by booth 11 to get a stuffed E. coli and don’t miss Erik Norwald’s presentation on Fast, Cheap Drug Development with PUREcoli - Our new cell line redefining microbial expression.
